name: Coop's Board
description: Starting semaglutide in Jan, focusing on sustainable habits and weekly check-ins. Tracking appetite changes and energy levels.

name: Toby Man
description: On tirzepatide after plateauing last year. Goal: -35 lbs by summer. Logging workouts, hydration, and side effects.

name: Cheddar man
description: GLP-1 maintenance phase. Stabilizing weight, adding protein and step goals. Monthly body comp scans.

name: Jess' Cut Phase
description: PCOS + sema. Prioritizing fiber and breakfast protein. Biweekly measurements and photos.

name: Mike's Marathon & Mounjaro
description: Training for half marathon while titrating tirzepatide. Watching fuel timing to avoid nausea.

name: Plant-Based Progress
description: Vegan on GLP-1. Meal prep with tofu/legumes. Tracking iron/B12 energy dips and satiety cues.

name: New Dad Reboot
description: Sleep deprived but consistent. Short home workouts, fiber target 30g/day, evening walk with stroller.

name: Wedding Cut 2026
description: Engagement photos in 4 months. Sema + calorie floor guardrails; no skipping meals. Dress fitting milestones.

name: Hypertension Helper
description: Doctor-approved GLP-1 use with BP meds. Sodium awareness, daily weigh-ins, weekly averages.

name: Desk Job Undo
description: Sedentary to 8k steps/day. Lunch walk club, water reminders, and resistance bands under the desk.

name: Prep Before Baby
description: OB cleared preconception weight loss. Gentle calorie deficit, prenatal vitamin, zero alcohol.

name: Travel While Titrating
description: Frequent flights; packing protein snacks and electrolytes. Scheduling doses away from long-haul days.

name: Strength First Cut
description: Prioritizing lifting 3x/week to preserve muscle. Protein 130g target, creatine, body tape each Sunday.

name: IBS-Friendly GLP-1
description: Low-FODMAP rotation to manage GI while on dose escalation. Tracking trigger foods and relief days.

name: Sugar Cravings Tamer
description: Evening cravings down on GLP-1. Swapping desserts for Greek yogurt bowls. Weekend treat budgeting.

name: Postpartum Power-Up
description: 6 months postpartum; cleared for exercise. Gentle cardio + pelvic floor, protein-forward snacks.

name: Coach's Demo Board
description: Sample curriculum for group coaching: hunger scale, plate method, weekend strategy, check-ins.

name: Keto to Moderate
description: Transitioning from strict keto to moderate carbs on GLP-1. Watching energy and gym performance.

name: Plateau Breaker Plan
description: Stalled at week 20; adding step-ups, fluids, and fiber bump. Considering dose increase per MD.

name: Holiday Season Sanity
description: Party-heavy month. GLP-1 helps portions; pre-event protein and one plate rule. No guilt recaps.
